name: 02-Data Dictionary
content:
OTIF Dataset Definition:-


  • jobid: Job Identification Number
  • PurchaseOrder_Received_Date: The date on which the purchase order was received
  • Materials_Availability_Date: The date on which materials were made available for a job
  • Production_Started_Date: The date on which production was started for a job
  • Production_Completed_Date: The date on which production was completed for a job
  • Quantity_Produced: Quantity produced under a job
  • Unit_Of_Measure: Unit of measurement for quantity produced
  • Shipment_Shipped_Date: The date on which the shipment was shipped
  • OTIF: Flag indicating whether a job was completed on time and in full
  • Customer: Customer name



Data Preparation:-


  • MA_PS_DaysDiff: Difference in days between the materials availability date (materials_availablity_date_dt) and the production started date (production_started_date_dt). It measures the duration between the availability of materials and the commencement of production.
  • PO_MA_DaysDiff: Difference in days between the purchase order received date (purchaseorder_received_date_dt) and the materials availability date (materials_availablity_date_dt). It measures the duration between the receipt of a purchase order and the availability of materials for production.
  • PS_PC_DaysDiff: Difference in days between the production started date (production_started_date_dt) and the production completed date (production_completed_date_dt). It measures the duration of the production process.
  • PC_SS_DaysDiff: Difference in days between the production completed date (production_completed_date_dt) and the shipment shipped date (shipment_shipped_date_dt). It measures the duration between the completion of production and the shipment of products.
  • PR_SS_DaysDiff: Difference in days between the purchase order received date (purchaseorder_received_date_dt) and the shipment shipped date (shipment_shipped_date_dt). It measures the duration between the receipt of a purchase order and the shipment of products.
